text: Gardenia mannii, the nānū, Oahu gardenia or Mann's gardenia, is a species of flowering tree in the coffee family, Rubiaceae, that is endemic to the island of Oahu in Hawaii. It inhabits coastal mesic, mixed mesic, and wet forests at elevations of in the Koolau and Waianae Ranges. It is threatened by habitat loss. There are 18 populations remaining with a total of no more than 110 individuals.USFWS. Gardenia mannii Five-year Review.
